Synopsis

Todo management module for jpic framework..

function todo_init()

Parameters:

  • None

Description

Declares module configuration variable names.

function todo_add()

Parameters:

  • $1: Todo name

Returns:

  • 2 If the todo name param was not given.

Description

Adds a todo to the list.

function todo_list()

Parameters:

  • None

Credit

Riviera#bash@irc.freenode.net

Description

Prints the todo list.

function todo_delete()

Parameters:

  • $1: Index of the todo.

Description

Removes a todo from the list.
